links.title: $AAPL The Bullish Option Trade After an Earnings Rip in Apple Inc
links.description: If you've ever seen a stop rip off of earnings and wondered if that was a signal for a trade, or if the momentum would continue, then this is exactly the back-test you are after. We call it "star gazing" when a stock rips and we're stuck -- with no idea what to expect next.

links.title: After subpoenaing Apple in trade secrets case, Tesla goes after Facebook
links.description: View more stories In an ongoing high-stakes lawsuit, Tesla has now asked a judge for emergency permission to serve subpoenas on numerous tech firms, including Facebook and Dropbox. Tesla believes these companies hold data connected to a recently-fired technician that the auto company says stole its trade secrets.

links.title: Parallels debuts feature-packed Toolbox Packs for Mac, priced from $9.99/year
links.description: Parallels is upgrading its Mac app today with three new Toolbox Packs that include various collections of features for specific needs. Each Toolbox Pack is available for Parallels on both macOS and Windows, and Toolbox Packs can be bought individually or as a bundle so customers have more choice.

Apple, Samsung settle 7-year battle over smartphone design $AAPL #AAPL https://www.marketbeat.com/n/3931425/

links.title: Apple, Samsung settle 7-year battle over smartphone design
links.description: SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) - Apple and Samsung have finally settled a seven-year battle over smartphones that went all the way to the U.S. Supreme Court. The bitter rivals notified U.S. District Court Judge Lucy Koh of the truce in a notice filed Wednesday. Terms of the settlement weren't disclosed.
